cis175.clockproject - package cis175.clockproject
 
Clock - Class in cis175.clockproject
abstract class - root class of all other simulated clock classes.
Clock(Clock_Interface.CLOCK_TYPE, long, double, String) - Constructor for class cis175.clockproject.Clock
 
Clock_Interface - Interface in cis175.clockproject
Declares three abstract methods to be implemented by all concrete subclasses.
Clock_Interface.CLOCK_TYPE - Enum in cis175.clockproject
Defines enumerated type used in implementation of concrete objects which are subclasses of Clock.
clockName - Variable in class cis175.clockproject.Clock
Declares String variable used by constructor and concrete displayTime() methods.
